statements: DELETE FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_name = 'Sustainable Living';
DELETE FROM cultural_trends WHERE trend_id = (SELECT trend_id FROM cultural_influences WHERE influence_name = 'Technology' AND category = 'Digital Media');
DELETE FROM user_comments WHERE user_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM influencers WHERE country = 'USA' AND profession = 'Musician'
DELETE FROM trend_relation WHERE trend_id = 5 AND influencer_id = 10;
DELETE FROM influencers WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe' AND profession = 'Artist';
